name: TheOdd1sOut Tetris Edition
description:
TheOdd1sOut Tetris Edition is a fan made game about, you guessed it, the youtuber TheOdd1sOut .

I'm going to explain some basic things about the game but you can find a lot more info if you click the "?" button in the main menu.

The game was meant to play with one player on WASD and the other on the mouse. But it's possible to play alone as both.

Controls - (not very detailed)
Use the scroll wheel to switch tools. left click to use them. WASD to move. Esc to pause.
